review.comment: THESE GENTLEMEN ARE THE BEST OF THE BEST!!! On Stop Shop Get It ALL Done!!  My Husband Bought me a Car from Them for My Birthday And Omg The Experience Was TOP NOTCH!!! The wrap team Auri and Zach  are the BOMB!!! The The Sales Side.. Nick is the BEST..patience of Job he is #1 At proving you an Experience of a Salesman that is no pressure. Alongside my Ark..Noah took care of me and the WHOLE CREW, Michael, Zach and the rest all are the TOP SHELF...Kind, Efficient, Knowledgeable and Sharp!!! MY WRAP Is SOOOOOOO GORGEOUS💙💙💙!!! Everywhere I Pull UP ..Folks are Saying How Beautiful My S Class Benz Is... Go Here, they are Diamonds tucked away in Westlake... Love Love Love This Place. I Willlll Refer and BE Back. We are Family now! Hugs Guys... She Cute. hahah Shondrella 💋💙 not sure how to tag my photos but I'd like too...💃🏾
Took my BMW in for full ceramic tint and it looks fantastic! Dealing with Aurian was quick and easy, a very hassle free experience. Noah took great car of my ride! Great communication.
Super professional shop, those guys do great work down there highly recommend
They broke my $300 reading glasses and they could not even apologize not the manager wanted to be on the phone they are the worse and was quickly eager to take your money
review.review_reply:
Our Records do not show any service done for a Joel Alcide. We are not a business to break something during a service without bringing it to our clients attention and paying in full for our mistakes. Please reach out to us so we can figure out a solution and reimburse your reading glasses if this is truly something that occurred.

Aurian (Owner @ Diamond Auto Salon)

review.comment: Great experience with DAS. Would recommended to anyone looking for auto services.
Very professional and detail oriented. Took two cars to them: our Benz for a full wrap and our new Defender for full window tint and brake caliper painting. Both cars look amazing!

Top-notch workmanship and service. My car looks better now than when I bough it from dealer. I wish I had consulted with them before I bought my car. They are experts in Auto industry and I would have saved money when I bought my car.
Noah, Arizona and Zach are great guys! Took care of my car and it looks fantastic (Model 3, ceramic tint ).  Highly recommended.

Without a doubt these guys must be the best in Ventura County if not the greater Southern California region. I have never had better customer service anywhere, for anything. When I was shopping around for a wrap for my BMW IA, I called several different shops who, of course promised exceptional service. The reason I went with Diamond Auto is that, from the first conversation with Aurian, I could tell they were going to authentically deliver on this claim.  First, I appreciate that they weren’t able to get me in immediately. As a matter fact it took about three weeks before I was able to finally bring my car in and drop it off. Nearly all the other auto salons I called stated that they could take me in right away. This was a little concerning to me wondering why they perhaps didn’t have enough business. That said… They scheduled me for a very specific time to have a consultation, and ultimately a timeframe to have the work done. Specifically, Aurian, Zach, and Noah were friendly, punctual, forthcoming, and very knowledgeable. During the process of completing the wrap, wheels, and tires, they communicated with me frequently and always made sure that my concerns were addressed. My job dropped when I saw the completed work for the first time.  They presented it to me on their showroom floor and of course made themselves available to answer any questions I had as we did a very comprehensive walk around. Their professionalism didn’t stop with the completion of the vehicle. After several weeks and 1000 walks around the vehicle, I did notice a minuscule bubble in the door wrap, and a small area of wrap on the side view mirror that didn’t have a perfect edge. When I called the shop, they asked me to bring it in as soon as possible and they set all work aside to prioritize my vehicle.  To top it off, I even brought my vehicle to them when I thought there was an issue with my side view mirror cameras that may have been caused during the wrap of the vehicle. Turns out, it wasn’t their doing at all, however, they fixed it at no cost and with a smile on their face. Absolutely unbelievable top-notch customer service.  bringing in $140,000 car for work like this was obviously a bit nerve-racking, but from day one I felt at ease knowing I couldn’t have put my vehicle in better hands. You truly be hard-pressed to find a better.

This is my first Google review and I'm writing based on the great service (and price) that I received from Kai and the team. Although my repair was relatively modest, Kai was extremely professional, courteous and timely throughout the entire process.

After deciding to hold on to my '15 diesel Q5, I took it into Auri and his team to freshen it up, and boy did they!  Full body satin silver metallic wrap, gloss black chrome delete, headlight/taillight tint, 21" Vossen wheels, 3M ceramic tint, gloss black painted grille, and it goes on.....

I was referred by a friend, and after seeing the shop, which is SO clean, and meeting with Auri, I just gave him the keys and told him to do his thing! Trusted him with it, and couldn't be happier with the finished product, it's like a brand new car!!

I highly recommend Diamond Auto Salon, they take extreme pride and care in their work, which is HUGE, and they deliver on their work!!

Aurian and his team took great care of me and my 2020 Model 3 performance. I had the following services done (Full tint, Full body stealth PPF, ceramic coating, chrome delete and powder coating on the wheels). It turned out amazing and Aurian is very competitive with his pricing compared to other local shops.

Aurian is a great communicator and is very personal with helping you get the exact look and feel you want. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a shop to work on their Tesla or other high end vehicles.

Nothing but the BEST... If you love your car and you want to have it looking amazing.. Call Diamond Auto Salon... You will find more than you could ever expect. It was a candy store for my car... I cant wait to get something else done. I approve this message lol...

Amazing, truly amazing! I had a vision for my car and with the DIAMOND touch, Aurian and his awesome team made it a reality. If you want a professional and truly satisfying and experience, there is really no where else to look!

All I can say is wow!!! Auri and his team literally did an amazing job on my Mini Cooper S Clubman. Their professionalism, the detail in their work, and expertise are top-notch! My Mini looks fabulous and I have received so many compliments.

I went in for vinyl striping, powder coat wheels glass black, chrome delete and window tint. Auri suggested I get the paint correction and ceramic coating. I'm glad he suggested it, the paint looks amazing! The overall work is 5 stars! Thanks, Diamond Auto Salon!!!

The best word to describe Diamond Auto Salon - AMAZING! Why?  First, Auri and Zach will always put their customers first.  They have years of experience in customizing autos to your desire.   No job is too big or small.  Auri and Zach gave my BMW X5M a new look - - full conversion /  Dark Satin Wrap, Ceramic coating, new wheels and tires, painted calipers, black vinyl roof wrap, etc..  It looks amazing - - -110% satisfied.  Not only will get you an amazing new look, you'll deal with constant professionals that are dedicated to customer satisfaction. Thank you Diamond Auto Salon -- you have a customer for life!!!!!  Robert

Went with Diamond after getting quotes from and speaking with a handful of shops. Their pricing was the most competitive and I liked the ideas Aurian had for my new Model Y. I had a color in mind and wanted to powder coat the wheels to match the trim and get some tint and the rest was all them.

Ended up getting the following for less than every other quote:
3M Satin Perfect Blue wrap
Ceramic coating over the wrap
SunTek CIR tint
Smoked headlight film
Powder coated wheels
Painted emblem

You can see a before shot as well as afters of the Y. Turns heads everywhere we go. Couldn't be happier. I've already referred people to Diamond and I'm sure they'll be just as happy with the results!
Diamond Auto Salon team did a good job installing clear bra over my entire vehicle and window tint on my Model Y. I highly recommend them

Hands down, DiamondAuto Salon in the best in So Cal.  I've taken my car to many places over the years and I have to say this place has mastered the art of  ----  customer first service, professionalism, vision, amazing service, first class work/results, etc.

Auri and Zach are constant professionals -- Took my wife's M4 for Ceramic Coating Paint and Power Coating Satin Black wheels..... It looks Amazing.  I'm taking my X5M in 2 weeks to be wrapped -- looking forward to it.   Thanks again - I strongly recommend  Diamond Auto Salon in Westlake Village, CA.    A++++++

As I plan to take my car to the track in the near future I wanted to get some PPF on it. I also was also interested in getting a wrap to change the color and was debating on which one to get. After some googling discovered that Stek has a clear bra that also gives the car a matte look so problem solved. I checked Stek for local installers and found Diamond Auto Salon. It was a bit of a drive but after reading reviews I knew this is where I had to take my car.  Aurian responded the same day and sent me samples and quotes within minutes.  On top of that he had a 25% discount.  I ended up buying every option he had for my car and as you can see, it came out amazing.  On top of that, Aurian sent me pictures on a daily basis and kept me up to date on all the work. He even took some amazing pictures for me.  I'm recommending anyone who loves their car and is interested in not only pristine work but also out of this world customer service to check out Diamond Auto Salon.  Ask for Aurian and tell them Alex with model 3 sent you.

So I had been looking to tint my car for quite some time now. I researched as much as I could and found out that not all tints are the same. My online search led me to Suntek Ceramic Tinting. I was already sold on the product and what it does, I just needed to find an installer that had the customer service and professionalism to win me over and take my money. A quick look at Diamond Auto Salon’s website shows that not only that they work on high end cars, but also that they make sure their online presentation is up to par. Upon requesting a quote, I was immediately contacted via text and was amazed at how responsive they were. A quick ceramic tint job turned into two of my cars tinted. Not only that, but the owner Auri demonstrated his other bread and butter on my 5 year old beat up car, Feynlab’s self healing ceramic coating. The paint of the car looked like it belonged in a junk yard, and Auri and his team revived it to look BETTER than when I had bought it in 2015.

The product that Diamond Auto Salon offers speaks for itself. What their team does is not only install and have you on your way, they strive to give outstanding customer service, educate/inform you about every minute detail of the product/process and ensure that there is no confusion along the way. Auri, along with co-owner Zach, are clearly passionate and driven in what they do and it’s apparent from the moment one visits their shop.

Don’t let their age nor the age of their shop confuse you. At a year old their business has won me over to the point that when I buy my next car, I will drive it directly to them from the dealer to protect my investment. I shopped around before I found my way to them and the difference in all around experience is night and day.

I give my highest recommendation to Auri, Zach and the team at Diamond Auto Salon. If you need top of the line ceramic tinting or your car’s dying paint job revived they are undoubtedly the people to see. They’re extremely approachable, under promise and over deliver and will have you smiling as you drive out after your car’s been pampered.

I ran across diamond auto salon while searching for a professional window tint shop. I chose them simply because of the time aurian spent on the phone with me. I learned more about tint in the 15 minutes we talked while others just really mumbled a price and didn’t care to tell me why they were different. A+ install as expected and such a nice group of guys. Thanks diamond! The ceramic tint during this heat is amazing!

5 star service from the guys over at Diamond Auto Salon.

From the very beginning, Aurian was quick to answer each and every question I had about getting my new Tesla model 3 tinted and ceramic coating. I ended up starting my work getting 20% ceramic tint and it came out AMAZING. Looking forward to getting the rest done from them soon!

Outstanding work!

Great guys who treat everyone with respect regardless of age. Went to get my windows tinted in their carbon option. They ran out of the carbon so they upgraded me to the ceramic tint( much higher quality) for only $100 more due to the circumstance. Will 100 percent be returning for more work to my car!

We have done so many times window tinting during  the years when change cars but this place is definitely the best. Not only the good job they do but also the great service! The crews are knowledgeable, patient and friendly.
You feel welcome and comfortable. Hope they keep the great work!

Top tier service from top tier people. Went in with my CLA250 and got a roof wrap and head/tail light smoke and doorhandles wrapped. Car looks much cleaner and way better than stock. They respond almost immediately and take care of you to make sure you got the best service possible. Best customer service.
Very poor customer service. Don't even bother.
review.review_reply: Please stop leaving fake reviews on our platforms.

review.comment: Auri (and Zach) both came from another customization shop and decided to open their own shop after 10+ years of witnessing what works and what doesnt work at their old shop working for someone else. They seemed to have taken what works at the old job (good customer service and attention to detail) and eliminated all of the other BS associated with other shops that put profits ahead of the customers needs and wishes. I applaud these two kids (I call anyone under 50 a kid) for taking a huge gamble and taking the time, energy and money needed to open up their own shop in an effort to change the norm in the industry and bring it up to a whole other level. The bottom line here is that the owners (Auri and Zach) care deeply and passionately about the service that they provide to their customers! I come from the high end automobile business my whole life and have used at least 10 or so "customization shops" in and around the LA basin and even though some of them were GOOD I would rank Diamond Auto Salon GREAT and my top pick for any referrals for anyone looking to make their stock car look waaaaaaay better than factory OEM. Their paint correction/detail staff are some of the best that I have ever seen and in my case their vinyl wrap guys are some of the best out there as well! As a fellow Yelper I encourage you to go get an estimate from DAS and at least talk to either Aurian or Zach and see for yourself. As you can see from my pics posted I own a Tesla Model S and they did a full custom wrap for me along with a new set of Vossen wheels, the brake calipers wrapped in red and logos! I also liked the fact that Auri tends to underpromise and overdeliver in terms of "timing" as they finished my car in record time (and it was the holidays)! Good job guys I wish y'all the best and keep up the good work
review.review_reply:
Hi Glen,

We're so happy to have met you and to be able to give you an experience in the auto industry that you've never had before. Our install quality is something you will not find at other shops and we're super happy with how your Tesla turned out!

On a personal level, Auri and Zach would like to thank you for the kind words. They've been in this industry for years now and certainly have something to show for it. We're happy that you took some of their recommendations as well to help make the car look as good as it does and can't wait to do some more work for you in the near future.

Many Thanks!

The DAS Team

review.comment: They’re great. Service amazing, amazing value, Precision installs, they perfectly matched the toughest paint color (metallic white) wow!

I came here to get my windows tinted on my Mazda Cx5 and they did an amazing job! While my car was in the shop they fixed two scratches on my car and I was so shocked when I picked up my car. Everyone who works there is so helpful and wants to help in any way they can to make your car the best is can be. Quality service and quality people!!!
review.review_reply:
Hi Sierra,

Thank you for taking the time to review our shop with your overall experience. We take great pride in our workmanship and customer service here at Diamond Auto Salon and can’t wait to work with you more in the future! Thank you again and enjoy your car!

Sincerely,
The DAS Team

review.comment: I recently dropped my Model 3 off at The Diamond Auto Salon to get it covered with feynlab self heal lite and a chrome delete for a great price. These guys were awesome!! From start to finish Aurian was always quick to respond and answer any questions I had. He was very helpful throughout the entire process, and my car came out exactly as I had hoped for. These guys are true professionals and provide quality service which I highly recommend for any of your vehicle needs. If quality is a must, give The Diamond Auto Salon a call!!
review.review_reply:
Hi Cody,

Thank you for allowing us to complete your beautiful Tesla Model 3 and giving us your opinion of working with us from A-Z. Auri is certainly one of the most knowledgeable in the industry and quite quick to respond! We’re pleased to hear that your car turned out exactly the way you wanted and we look forward to working with you and your friends/family in the near future!

Sincerely,
The DAS Team

review.comment: As far as quality goes, Diamond Auto Salon is second to none. They do impeccable work on their vehicles. Their attention to detail is well noticed and goes a long way. I didn't realize that my car could actually look shinier than when I took delivery of it brand new. The ceramic coating treatment is incredible technology. They also do wraps, tint and wheels. Go see DAS and their team to experience the best service in Conejo Valley.
review.review_reply:
Hi Nick,

Thank you for taking the time to review our shop and the kind words about your experience. The truth is out that your car really can look better than the day you picked it up! Thanks for trusting us and our knowledge with your new Jeep!

Sincerely,
The DAS Team

review.comment: Came here to get some preliminary tint work done on my 2018 Jeep grand Cherokee's windshield after a rock chip destroyed my last windshield in Phoenix and to get a quote for some stuff in the future. Special shout out to Auri & Zach. These dudes were the "brains of the outfit" behind the last company, which shall not be named (no plug lol), that used to work on my car. They always engineered the best price and work on my vehicle so it's dope that they now have their own shop. They use maximum precision and quality effort....damn near perfectionists. When do i purchase my new whips (Lexus LS F sport coming soon), I will definitely bring it here to get all the works (full tint, clear bra, etc)
review.review_reply:
Hello,

Thanks for following our passion and expertise! We can’t wait to do more work with you in the near future!

Thank you,
The DAS Team

review.comment: Was recently on Instagram and saw a car buddy had posted a video regarding their car which had recently been ceramic coated by DAS. I couldn’t believe the way the water had reacted to the paint and had to see it for myself. The team over at diamond auto salon are extremely knowledgeable and thoroughly explained to me the process in which the product was applied and how to maintain it afterwards. I can’t stop staring at my car now, it’s literally one big mirror!
review.review_reply:
Hi Ryan,

Thank you for checking us out on Instagram and we’re glad you enjoyed our shop and expertise. With over 10 years of experience in this industry we feel that it’s important to educate our customers and like to show them some of the cars we’re working on in that moment. Remember, if you can’t eat off it, we didn’t do it 😉.

Thank you,
The DAS Team

review.comment: These guys are hands down THE best in town/county/state!! If you love your car, truck, motorcycle, and want nothing but the best, whether it be a custom wrap(that you'll swear was a paint job) to the very best in paint protection or anything in between, this is the ONLY place to go. Perfection is the name of the game when you bring your vehicle to DAS!!
review.review_reply:
Hi Mark,

Thank you for taking the time to review our shop. We appreciate it very much and we strive to offer top notch work as you mentioned and can’t wait to work more with you in the near future!

Thank you,
The DAS Team

review.comment: Amazing service and super professional. Zach and Auri were very helpful and made everything quick and easy.
review.review_reply:
Richard,

It was a pleasure working on your vehicle. We hope you enjoy your cars ceramic coating and window tint. Keep us in mind if you ever need anything else.

Thank you,
DAS Team

review.comment: Zach and crew are very knowledgeable. I would not hesitate to bring my truck back!
review.review_reply:
Robert,

We are honored to hear that you enjoyed your experience with Diamond Auto Salon. Your truck looks amazing after the Feynlab self heal lite. Thank you for choosing us and we look forward to servicing your vehicle in the near future!

Thank you,
DAS Team

review.comment: Best in the business! Be sure to stop by the shop or call in to get an appointment set up! YOU WON’T BE DISAPPOINTED. These guys kill it!
review.review_reply:
Casey,

Thank you so much for the enthusiasm. We are extremely pleased to have loyal clients like you. It drives us to continue delivering the highest level of customer service and quality! See you soon

Das Team

review.comment: Best in the business! If you need any auto care/ work done this is the place. Zach and Aurian are both super professional and have the best prices by far. Top of the line materials and services that won’t break the bank. If you’re serious about protecting your investment then this is the place!
review.review_reply:
Noah,

Thank you very much for your feedback of our new location! We are excited to finally bring the ultimate protection shop to Westlake village and can't wait for clients to experience what you have been for many years with Aurian and Zach.

Das Team

review.comment: Having some work done on my jeep and some new tint for my front windows. Ari and Zach have been great to work with. Great advice on parts and styling. Shop is clean and high end.
review.review_reply:
Jesse,

Thank you for your loyalty to us. Your jeep is now nicely dialed in and ready to withstand the upcoming heat wave with the suntek ceramic infared front window tint. Please let us know if there is anything else we can do to ensure your experience with us remains nothing less than perfect.

Best Regards,
DAS Team

review.comment: I found Diamond Auto Salon online with many good reviews, so I decided to check them out. Came in and spoke to Zach, all I have to say is very honest person. Not to mention the other staff where very helpful and amazing. Zach showed me a ceramic coating demo which really gave me an understanding to the product. One other think that blew my mind was the STEK tinted paint protection film, which I also got done. Lastly, I decided to powder coat my factory wheels gloss black and picking up my car, my mind was blown to the reveal of my car. This was all done to my Mercedes Benz C300, these guys are the real deal, don’t let their recent opening turn you away, they have many years of experience in the auto detailing and automotive industry!
review.review_reply:
Camden,

All I have to say is WOW. Your Mercedes C300 came out unbelievable with Feynlabs Ceramic Lite package and STEK clear bra protection film and taillight smoke. Oh and dont forget those deep gloss black powdercoated wheels. We hope you enjoy the (pretty much) new ride and thank you again for the business and trust with Diamond Auto Salon. It was very heartwarming to see your jaw dropping reaction to what we did.

Thank you again,
DAS Team

review.comment: Solid group over here, I stopped in for a broken windshield and they took care of it all! They even cleaned the interior up as it was pretty messy when I dropped the car off. Thanks guys, see you soon.
review.review_reply:
Hi Mark,

Thank you for reviewing your experience with us and allowing us to replace your windshield. We are pleased to hear that you are overly satisfied with your experience as customer service and cleanliness is our #1 priority. We look forward to working more with you in the near future!

Thank You,
Zach Kaplan

review.comment: Paint corrected and put a paint protection film on my car in a day and a half.  Great quality work and awesome dudes there, for sure will be back
review.review_reply:
Hi Daniel,

Thank you for giving us the opportunity to work on your car. Paint correction is always an important 1st step before paint protection films to ensure the best finish and we’re happy to hear that you’re pleased with the turnout.

Thank you,
Zach Kaplan

review.comment: Stop by to Diamond Auto Salon to talk about ceramic coatings and window tinting. Zach and Auri are the people to talk to!! They are very knowledgeable in what they are doing! They showed me some of their cars they are working on and I noticed many cars being ceramic coated and also some window tints going on. I am super stoked soon my car will look good! Come check it out the one stop shop in the Westlake village area for auto detailing and ceramic coatings.
review.review_reply:
Hello Nito,

Thank you for reviewing your experience with our team here at Diamond Auto Salon in Westlake Village. We find that knowledge is super important so that our customers feel comfortable with our work and having cars around the shop on display help a lot too. We thank you for your time letting us explain ceramic coatings and window tint on a more in depth level and can’t wait to work with you again in the near future.

Thank you,
Zach Kaplan

review.comment: Zach really helped me out with my car by ceramic coating it... got a wrap job in satin black on my mirror caps and roof.... I’m super stoked on the excellent work they did and the fast customer service.... they had my car in and finished one day after I came in for an appointment. Great choice to come here if you’re looking for high quality work! :)
review.review_reply:
Hi Caden,

We’re super happy to hear how excited you are about your roof and mirror vinyl wrap and Ceramic coating. We strive to provide top notch customer service and timing and look forward to working with you again in the near future.

Thank you,
Zach Kaplan

review.comment:
From Start to finish Auri and Zach did a tremendous job, giving great advice, options and performing professional top shelf work on detailing, Paint correction and Ceramic Coating on my 2017 Ford F150. It looks brand new, even better then NEW!!

5 Stars for Diamond Auto Salon, you have to bring your car to the real pro's.
review.review_reply:
Hi Jay,

Thank you for taking the time to review Diamond Auto Salon! We enjoy nothing more than turning cars into diamonds and a ceramic coating is certainly the best way to maintain it. Look forward to working more with you soon!

Thank you,
The DAS Team

review.comment:
Zach and Auri know what they're doing!
I felt very comfortable and at home at this shop. I came to get my car ceramic coated and full ceramic window tint. Tint was done in less than an hour and my car shines like no other car on the road with the ceramic coat and paint correction they did. I'm very picky about work done to my car and I seriously cant find a single bad thing to say. Thats a rare experience. 2 Thumbs up for Diamond Auto Salon.
review.review_reply:
Hi Nick,

Thank you for trusting us and our knowledge. With a combined 10+ years in the industry between Auri and Myself, we feel that it’s important to make sure our customers are fully educated on the services being performed on their car all the way from the product, to the procedure and also comfortable that the pricing in competitive for quality work in the industry. We can’t wait to do more work with you in the near future and look forward to displaying your car at our grand opening this Sunday!

Thank you,
Zach Kaplan

review.comment: Went in on Monday this week to get my windows tinted, the most seamless service I have ever been to! I even received a link that gave me access to my invoice, and if they sent any updates it would notify me over text which I thought was so cool! I got a text about an hour later that my car was ALREADY finished !!!! I have never been to an auto shop of any kind that treated me so well, has such great prices, and such amazing work! Before they could even give me my keys I booked a full ceramic coat to be completed in the same week. They fit me into the schedule and let me drop off my car when it was most convenient for me. Earlier I received update pictures and I am blown away. My paint looks better than it did coming out of the dealership!! So again, I booked ANOTHER service for a windshield tint this coming week! Diamond Auto Salon can officially say they have a customer for a lifetime! Thanks guys!!!
review.review_reply:
Hi Kali, we’re so happy to hear that you were pleased with your experience getting your windows tinted and your car ceramic coated. We’re also glad that you liked our modern day invoicing system and look forward to working more with you in the near future. Enjoy your protected BMW!

Thank you,
Zach Kaplan
